title: 已爬文...無解決方法? [Minecraft Classic的SER建設後,除了家中的電腦外別人都入到]
author: mo1524
txt_content:
本帖最後由 mo1524 於 2011-10-27 16:15 編輯

先感謝能教我的各位.....我已經很努力的在論壇找..而且中英文也GOOLE 了很多次...
我想做的並不是玩BTEA版的,
而是網頁的版本:http://www.minecraft.net/classic/list
那是CLASSIC版,我建SERVER後,別人都能進,一切正常,唯獨是家中的電腦,除了本機 都不能連進SER,到底如何解決呢!? 
感激感激 ><!

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 家里电脑像进服？ 等rickky呗

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
你这情况真奇怪，把一般情况都调转了

家中的电脑意思是同一台电脑还是另一台?

replies.author: mo1524
replies.txt_content:
rickky2 发表于 2011-10-27 22:40 
你这情况真奇怪，把一般情况都调转了

家中的电脑意思是同一台电脑还是另一台?
意思是局網(LAN)內 , 開設伺服(SER)的電腦能進去, 但其餘的電腦都進入失敗, 奇怪的是廣網(WAN) 的其他人就能連進來

replies.txt_content:

那内网里面的电脑用外网ip可以进服务器吗?

replies.author: mo1524
replies.txt_content:
rickky2 发表于 2011-10-28 01:33 
那内网里面的电脑用外网ip可以进服务器吗?
外網可以 唯內網不可

replies.author: mo1524
replies.txt_content:
rickky2 发表于 2011-10-28 01:33 
那内网里面的电脑用外网ip可以进服务器吗?
謝謝板主大哥,我解決了,只要在連結後加上 ?override=true复制代码就可以連到,
Example:http://www.minecraft.net/classic/play/4c3bebb1a01816acbe31c5ece1570da5?override=true

复制代码我貪心的問一下,有沒有CLASSIC的HOST設定指令等 ?
例如我見別人的地圖,同一地圖內限定某些建築物不能被拆,而某些區域任意編輯;
放個BOT在地圖(名字是紅名的GM) ; 又或者建立預設重生點等

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
mo1524 发表于 2011-10-28 01:47 
謝謝板主大哥,我解決了,只要在連結後加上就可以連到,
Example:我貪心的問一下,有沒有CLASSIC的HOST設定指 ...
官方的服务端只有这些指令
/op <name>         Ops the player with name <name>. They have to be logged in.
/deop <name>       De-ops a player.
/kick <name>       Kicks a player
/ban <name>        Bans and kicks a player
/unban <name>      Pardons a banned player
/banip <name>      Bans a player by ip number. Cannot be undone ingame, you must manually change banned-ip.txt
/say <message>     Broadcasts <message> across the entire server.
/setspawn          Sets the current location as the default spawn location for new players
/tp <name>         Teleports to a player.   
/solid             Switches between placing normal and placing unbreakable stone

如果要使用更多功能就需要下载一个第三方服务端，例如MCLawl

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
mo1524 发表于 2011-10-28 16:11 
CLASSICl版 服務器名稱 D3GAMEROOM   , 一定沒看錯
botadd <bot> [SuperOP] - Adds <bot> of the name specified.
Bots that share a name with a player will have that player's skin.
botai [add/del] <AIname> <extra> (shortcut = bai) [Advbuilder+] - Adds or deletes <AIname>.
Using [add] on an existing AI will append the next instruction.
"/botai del last" will remove last action added.
<extra> includes:
walk - Bot walks to current coordinates (default).
teleport - Bot will teleport to set location after completing current action.
wait [time] - Bot will wait.
nod [time] [speed] - Bot will nod.
spin [time] [speed] - Bot will spin.
reset - Resets bot to original position.
remove - Removes bot after finishing previous action.
reverse - Bot will go backwards.
jump - Bot jumps at location. - ALPHA
linkscript - Uses an existing script as next parameter.
speed - Sets bot speed for next waypoint. - ALPHA
[time] is measured in 0.1 seconds.
[speed] is set as a percentage of normal speed.
botremove <bot> [SuperOP] - Removes <bot>.
"/botremove all" will remove all bots."
Specified bot(s) must be on the same level as you.
bots [Builder+] - Lists all bots, their AIs, and current levels.
botset <bot> <script> [Advbuilder+] - Sets <bot> to perform <script>.
Bots spin in place when not moving.
"/botset <bot>" with no script will remove current script(s).
Premade scripts: "hunt" and "kill", which tells <bot> to hunt (chase) a nearby player and kill users it's near.

額...很抱歉還有一個問題...能不能設定同一地圖內某些區域是不能破壞/建做 而某些區域可以?
zone [OP+] - Modifies or finds zones in an area (zones are areas which can only be modified by the group/person they're given to, or a superOP).
"/zone" finds any zones in the area given.
"/zone add <player>" adds a zone that only <player> can build in.
"/zone add <rank>" adds a zone that only <rank> and above can build in.
Zones do not ignore perbuild.
"/zone del" deletes any zone i the area clicked.
"/zone del all" deletes all zones in a map (SupeOP only).
